004 errors are a pretty good sign that your client doesn't have the right permission settings in place for League to be able to pull the files it needs. Make sure you run through the [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to get those working properly!
